titleStmt.title: Ambitions scourge Described in the morall fiction of Ixyon. By Sands Penuen.
titleStmt.author: Penuen, Sands.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Helme, and are to be solde at his shoppe, in S. Dunstons Church-yard in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; some print show-through, and some pages stained; lacking all after D2.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
